public class zeta.content.zirp.Act

(source file: Act.pizza)
java.lang.Object
   |
   +----zeta.content.zirp.Act
The pure class interface. 
public class Act
Actualization annotation slots. This slot is provided under certain conditions at terms of class absy.NameAppl if the syntax is context-checked. An actualization represents the sequence of instances of generic type parameters as they are derived by a type checker. This annotation is only present at name applications which represent generic global constants. It is not present at names which represent mSZ classes. The expressions contained in actualizations are restricted to type expressions, as defined in class Type.

Version: $Id: Act.pizza,v 1.1.1.1 1998/09/01 10:51:17 wg Exp $
See also:
